TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Vakangan, title = Vakangan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vakangan} }

S.FORM: alang Vakangan ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Genhe'I go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 140 buwan, 516 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 96% kyan ku 493 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 4% kyan ku 23 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun85%, Amis4%, Paywan2%, Cou1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Vakangan hya' ga Kainisungan. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Vakangan ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Vakangan ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Vakangan ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Genhe'I go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 140 bowan, 516 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 96% kyan ko 493 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 4% kyan ko 23 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon85%, Amis4%, Paywan2%, Coo1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Vakangan hya' ga Kainisongan. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Vakangan ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Vakangan ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
